login.title: Welcome!
login.description: Enter your credentials to access the portal.

dashboard.descripcion: From this panel you can manage the jokes content.
dashboard.sin_destacado: You don't have featured content, you can add one by pressing the on a joke.
dashboard.no_bromas: You don't have any jokes registered, to add new ones click the 'Add new joke' button at the top.

jokePage.descripcionEditar: From this form you can edit a joke to your liking.
jokePage.descripcionCrear: From this form you can add a new joke to your liking.

jokeForm.validacionLength: The joke must be at least 20 characters long.
